akn:section.akn:heading: Rights and protections under Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990 relating to public services and

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Entities subject to this section The requirements of this section shall apply to—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Discrimination in public services and accommodations

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Discrimination in public services and accommodations

(c) Remedy The remedy for a violation of subsection (b) shall be such remedy as would be appropriate if awarded under section 203 or 308(a) of the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990 (42 U.S.C. 12133, 12188(a)), except that, with respect to any claim of employment discrimination asserted by any covered employee, the exclusive remedy shall be under section 1311 of this title.
